document.full_text: when ratko mladic, nicknamed "the butcher of bosnia," arrives at the international war crimes detention center in the hague, he will join a who's who of accused genocidal dictators, warlords and mass murderers.
document.title: dutch seaside cell awaits mladic
lines_and_colors: when ratko mladic, nicknamed "the butcher of bosnia," arrives at the international war crimes detention center in the hague, he will join a who's who of accused genocidal dictators, warlords and mass murderers.
